biocontainers.name: bioconductor-poma
biocontainers.summary: POMA introduces a structured, reproducible and easy-to-use workflow for the visualization, pre-processing, exploratory and statistical analysis of mass spectrometry data. The main aim of POMA is to enable a flexible data cleaning and statistical analysis processes in one comprehensible and user-friendly R package. This package also has a Shiny app version that implements all POMA functions.
